title: New: Shy Girls – Still Not Falling
content:
Image: Dru Donovan

Having featured on a Cyril Hahn single (Perfect Form), and been remixed by none other than The-Drum, as well as clocking up an impressive number of plays with their debut single, Portland’s Shy Girls have returned, with new track Still Not Falling. Merging the soulful swoons of Deptford Goth and The Weeknd with a hook that Justin Timberlake would kill for, it’s a straight up jam, even if it does feature the rather comical line, “I’m not an athlete, I sit at home and make beats”. Check out Still Not Falling below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
